title: Restaurant 415
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a separate menu for vegans and many of the dishes on the regular menu can be made vegan upon request. Try the cauliflower steaks served over a bed of polenta and simply steamed greens (kale), with a spicy buffalo style sauce. Also offers vegan cupcakes. Serves fresh local food. Has a full bar. Sophisticated atmosphere.
